content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: low volatility 16.2% and full participation with breadth 8/8 sectors positive; risk appetite favors cyclicals and banks.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Construction & REIT ABOVE TREND: ENKAI (1W: +16.35% | 1M: +25.39%), EKGYO (1W: +8.97% | 1M: +24.76%). Holding & Investment ABOVE TREND: SAHOL (1W: +12.42% | 1M: +29.97%), KCHOL (1W: +4.85% | 1M: +23.05%).

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Technology & Telecom is the softest relative performer but still positive: KONTR (1W: +0.93% | 1M: -15.10%) RECOVERY; TTKOM/TCELL support the sector above trend. Transportation is weakest on momentum: THYAO (1W: +1.00% | 1M: +13.22%) ABOVE TREND, PGSUS (1W: +0.15% | 1M: +6.16%) ABOVE TREND.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
AKBNK (1W: +17.88% | 1M: +33.17%) ABOVE TREND; ENKAI (1W: +16.35% | 1M: +25.39%) ABOVE TREND; SISE (1W: +12.96% | 1M: +18.55%) ABOVE TREND; SAHOL (1W: +12.42% | 1M: +29.97%) ABOVE TREND; ISCTR (1W: +9.61% | 1M: +18.24%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
CCOLA (1W: +1.99% | 1M: +22.28%) ABOVE TREND; MGROS (1W: +1.35% | 1M: +22.03%) ABOVE TREND; THYAO (1W: +1.00% | 1M: +13.22%) ABOVE TREND; KONTR (1W: +0.93% | 1M: -15.10%) RECOVERY; ASELS (1W: +0.83% | 1M: +30.88%) ABOVE TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Highest 1W movers: AKBNK (1W: +17.88% | 1M: +33.17%) ABOVE TREND; ENKAI (1W: +16.35% | 1M: +25.39%) ABOVE TREND; SISE (1W: +12.96% | 1M: +18.55%) ABOVE TREND; SAHOL (1W: +12.42% | 1M: +29.97%) ABOVE TREND; TUPRS (1W: +8.41% | 1M: +32.75%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banking is a clear leader; AKBNK (1W: +17.88% | 1M: +33.17%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +9.61% | 1M: +18.24%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +6.61% | 1M: +12.40%) ABOVE TREND while HALKB (1W: -3.20% | 1M: +18.49%) CORRECTION flags short-term profit taking.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry broadly constructive: EREGL (1W: +4.14% | 1M: +18.30%) ABOVE TREND, FROTO (1W: +8.18% | 1M: +22.72%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +8.22% | 1M: +31.98%) ABOVE TREND; ARCLK (1W: -0.35% | 1M: +12.87%) CORRECTION and KRDMD (1W: -1.09% | 1M: +15.04%) CORRECTION show near-term dispersion.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy exposure is strong: TUPRS (1W: +8.41% | 1M: +32.75%) ABOVE TREND and SISE (1W: +12.96% | 1M: +18.55%) ABOVE TREND lead the sector while SASA (1W: +6.25% | 1M: -8.27%) RECOVERY signals thematic rotation back into cyclical chemicals.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk-on stance: overweight Banking, Construction/REIT and Energy cyclicals; size positions into leaders (AKBNK, TUPRS, ENKAI) while trimming recent parabolic moves for risk control and protecting gains in CORRECTION names (HALKB, ARCLK).

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
AKBNK (1W: +17.88% | 1M: +33.17%) ABOVE TREND; SAHOL (1W: +12.42% | 1M: +29.97%) ABOVE TREND; TUPRS (1W: +8.41% | 1M: +32.75%) ABOVE TREND; ENKAI (1W: +16.35% | 1M: +25.39%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +8.22% | 1M: +31.98%) ABOVE TREND.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Banking & Finance, Construction & REIT, Energy & Chemicals.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch XU100 behavior around recent highs for continuation and guards at the 20-day moving average for pullback buyers; macro/currency moves, global risk sentiment and quarterly earnings/capital flows are primary triggers.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

RISK-ON market with low volatility and unanimous sector breadth; cyclicals and banks lead the advance. Trade overweight banks, construction and energy while using CORRECTION names for tactical risk-reduction and RECOVERY names for selective rotation.
